tools.name: three_create_renderer
tools.description: 创建一个WebGL渲染器。Create a WebGL renderer.

width.description: 渲染器宽度（像素）。Renderer width in pixels.

height.description: 渲染器高度（像素）。Renderer height in pixels.

antialias.description: 是否启用抗锯齿。Whether to enable antialiasing.

alpha.description: 是否启用透明背景。Whether to enable transparent background.

backgroundColor.description: 背景颜色（十六进制格式）。Background color in hex format.

tools.name: three_render_scene
tools.description: 使用渲染器渲染场景。Render a scene using a renderer.

rendererId.description: 渲染器ID（由three_create_renderer返回）。Renderer ID (returned by three_create_renderer).

sceneId.description: 场景ID（由three_create_scene返回）。Scene ID (returned by three_create_scene).

cameraId.description: 相机ID（由相机创建工具返回）。Camera ID (returned by camera creation tools).

tools.name: three_get_renderer_canvas
tools.description: 获取渲染器的画布数据（Base64编码的PNG图像）。Get the renderer canvas data (Base64 encoded PNG image).

tools.name: three_set_renderer_size
tools.description: 设置渲染器尺寸。Set the renderer size.

width.description: 新宽度（像素）。New width in pixels.

height.description: 新高度（像素）。New height in pixels.
